subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: One game after Chase Utley broke Ruben Tejada’s leg, the Mets electrified Citi Field with a rout of the Dodgers and put themselves on the verge of advancing.
snippet: One game after Chase Utley broke Ruben Tejada’s leg, the Mets electrified Citi Field with a rout of the Dodgers and put themselves on the verge of advancing.
